topic.title: Conference Managment
topic.section: The Conference Manager's role is to manage conference in three main strands: setting up a conference website and establishing a scheduled instance of the conference. See {help_topic key="conference.generalManagement.index" text="General Management"}; building up the scheduled conference in all aspects. See {help_topic key="conference.currentConferences.index" text="Current Conferences"}; enrolling users in a variety of roles for running the conference. See {help_topic key="conference.users.index" text="Users"}, and {help_topic key="conference.roles.index" text="Roles"}.
